Description_lang: Your block chance is increased by $s1%, you are able to block spells, and your successful blocks deal $157122s1 Holy damage to your attacker.

description_blz.en_US: Your block chance is increased by 20%, you are able to block spells, and your successful blocks deal 60 Holy damage to your attacker.
description_blz.es_MX: Tu probabilidad de bloqueo aumenta un 20%, puedes bloquear hechizos y tus bloqueos exitosos infligen 59 p. de daño sagrado a tu atacante.
description_blz.pt_BR: Aumenta em 20% sua chance de bloqueio e possibilita o bloqueio de feitiços. Ao bloquear, você causa 58 de dano Sagrado ao atacante.
description_blz.de_DE: Eure Blockchance ist um 20% erhöht, Ihr könnt Zauber blocken und jedes erfolgreiche Blocken fügt Eurem Angreifer 59 Heiligschaden zu.
description_blz.en_GB: Your block chance is increased by 20%, you are able to block spells, and your successful blocks deal 60 Holy damage to your attacker.
description_blz.es_ES: Tu probabilidad de bloqueo aumenta un 20%, puedes bloquear hechizos y cada bloqueo realizado con éxito inflige 60 p. de daño Sagrado a tu atacante.
description_blz.fr_FR: Vos chances de bloquer sont augmentées de 20%, vous pouvez bloquer les sorts et les blocages réussis infligent 59 points de dégâts du Sacré à l’assaillant.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta la probabilità di blocco del 20% e permette di bloccare gli incantesimi. Inoltre, bloccare un attacco infligge 59 danni da sacro all'attaccante.
description_blz.ru_RU: Повышает вероятность блокирования на 20%. Позволяет блокировать заклинания. При успешном блокировании вы наносите атаковавшему 60 ед. урона от светлой магии.
description_blz.ko_KR: 방패 막기 확률이 20%만큼 증가하고 주문 공격을 막을 수 있게 됩니다. 방패 막기에 성공하면 공격자에게 60의 신성 피해를 입힙니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 你的格擋機率提高20%，並且可以格擋法術。此外，格擋成功時會對攻擊者造成58點神聖傷害。
description_blz.zh_CN: 你的格挡几率提高20%，还能格挡法术。成功格挡时会对攻击者造成58点神圣伤害。
